unnormalised: The solar rooftop subsidy program is vital for widespread adoption. Reduced costs encourage residents like Mr. Sharma in Mumbai to invest. Perhaps extending the scheme beyond 31/03/2024 would be beneficial. MNRE data from 10:00 hrs on 26/01/2023 shows significant uptake in Maharashtra. Increased awareness campaigns targeting smaller towns near Chennai before 15/08/2024 could further boost installations, reducing reliance on conventional power and supporting Atmanirbhar Bharat. The current Rs. 10,000 subsidy is a good start.
normalised: The solar rooftop subsidy program is vital for widespread adoption. Reduced costs encourage residents like Mister Sharma in Mumbai to invest. Perhaps extending the scheme beyond thirty first March two thousand and twenty four would be beneficial. M N R E data from ten zero zero hours on twenty sixth January two thousand and twenty three shows significant uptake in Maharashtra. Increased awareness campaigns targeting smaller towns near Chennai before fifteenth August two thousand and twenty four could further boost installations, reducing reliance on conventional power and supporting Atmanirbhar Bharat. The current rupee ten thousand subsidy is a good start.
